subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
World Series
lead_paragraph: On a night when Carlos Beltrán played for the first time in a week and the Mets lost their last regular season home game, Pedro Martínez was the focus of attention.
snippet: On a night when Carlos Beltrán played for the first time in a week and the Mets lost their last regular season home game, Pedro Martínez was the focus of attention.
